title: Anastasia (Part 2)
body:
Anastasia (Part 2)

Both guards who were standing felt their bodies stiffen just as the portal appeared there.

From the portal, a man who was around 190cm tall, had dark red skin and two horns on both sides of his head walked out.

The man was wearing causal-looking black pants and a shirt that oddly suit him well.

His deep red eyes were emotionless, and from time to time a small amount of red miasma was leaking out from his body.

Although the man was not releasing any aura after coming out, both of the guards who were standing felt their bodies shaking just by looking at the man.

After the man came out, the portal behind him disappeared and he looked at the guards without any emotion in his eyes.

When the guards felt the man was looking at them they felt a mountain was crushing down on them, and their legs started to shake.

Both of them were on verge of kneeling when a light blue portal appeared before the guards and the man.
